body:
I just wanted to make this topic to ask you guys a question. I have two options at the moment, and a decision. Should I use my legosean10 account or ItzSeanYT account on Avicus. At the moment these are the stats of the two accounts:

  legosean10

   Kills 13326
   Deaths 5100
   K/D 2.6129
   PVP K/D 2.7454
   Ranking 126th

   Donor Rank Emerald

  ItzSeanYT

   None :)


I just wanted to ask you guys which account you think I should use from now on. For those of you who don't know, I have restarted my youtube, email and basically everything to suit ItzSean instead of LegoSean. Please leave your ideas below, I just want to know. Also, if I get the chance to come back as a moderator (in which stats really don't matter) which account should I use?

Maybe leave your response like this?
Gameplay Account:
Youtubing Account:
Moderating Account:

  *Tell me which account would suit each of those categories best*

Thanks! 
Sean ^_^

title: Which do you think?

replies.body: I think you should try to convince the staff in some way to transfer all your legosean10 stats to ItzSean and then just never use legosean. But there is a high possibility they'll say no.
replies.body_tagged: I think you should try to convince the staff in some way to transfer all your legosean10 stats to ItzSean and then just never use legosean. But there is a high possibility they'll say no.

replies.body: use ItzSean for everything and use legosean10 for like other stuff
replies.body_tagged: use ItzSean for everything and use legosean10 for like other stuff

replies.body: IDK, that ItzSean guy is way better compared to that other guy..
replies.body_tagged: IDK, that ItzSean guy is way better compared to that other guy..

replies.body: You can't get stat transfers. I checked :)
replies.body_tagged: You can't get stat transfers. I checked :)
